dt: {bc}not aligned with a political or ideological grouping
{bc}of or relating to a neutral state or power
{bc}not decided or pronounced as to characteristics {bc}{sx|indifferent||}
{bc}produced with the tongue in the position it has when at rest

et: Middle English {it}neuterall{/it} mutually neutralizing, from Medieval Latin {it}*neutralis{/it}, back-formation from {it}neutralitas{/it} middle ground, from Latin {it}neutralis{/it} neuter, from {it}neutr-, neuter{/it}
shortdef: not engaged on either side; specifically : not aligned with a political or ideological grouping
of or relating to a neutral state or power
not decided or pronounced as to characteristics : indifferent
